select * from t_course_order
order by order_date desc limit #{start},#{pageSize};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_course_order (uuid,order_id,name,wechat_no,wechat_mark, qq_no,tel,course_name,course_price,order_date, update_datetime,remark) VALUES (UUID(), UUID(), #{name}, #{wechat_no},#{wechat_mark}, #{qq_no}, #{tel}, #{course_name}, #{course_price},#{order_date}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),#{remark});
mapper.update: UPDATE t_course_order SET name = #{name},wechat_no = #{wechat_no}, wechat_mark = #{wechat_mark},qq_no = #{qq_no}, tel = #{tel},course_name = #{prod_name}, course_price = #{prod_price},order_date = #{order_date}, remark = #{remark} WHERE order_id = #{order_id}
mapper.select: SELECT LEFT(order_date,7) as date, count(*) as total, SUM(convert(course_price,decimal(18,2))) as income from t_course_order GROUP BY LEFT(order_date,7);
